name: pyLwt
short_description:
This is a lifting wavelet program running in Windows7 and Ubuntu10.04.4,

It is a mix program of Python and C++. The GUIs are built using Python, and the core algorithms of wavelet are built using standard C++.

Notes:

1. To run this program, you should sure that the following dependent packages are installed in your computer: ctypes, wxPython, PIL, and NumPy?

2. I test this program using python2.7.3 in Windows7 and python2.6.5 in Ubuntu 10.04.4

3. You can run it using this command: "python wavelet.py"

4. Good Luck
summary: Liftng wavelet program built using python and g++
